title: El Clasico
text: Ramos saved Real Madrid by scoring at 90. It was a huge disappointment for Barcelona.

title: Andy Murray finished world no. 1 for the first time of his career
text: It was a huge surprise for every tennis fan this year, everyone was expecting Djokovic to dominate the tour, but Murray ended the season without losing.

title: Raptors franchise record
text: Saturday was a huge night for Toronto Raptors. They improved their franchise history record of score difference by beating Atlanta Hawks with 44 points (128 - 84).

title: Splash Brothers
text: They are on fire right now, it seems like no team in the world can beat Golden State.

title: Bournemouth vs Liverpool
text: It was a great comeback Bournemouth and a huge missed opportunity for Liverpool. They should have won the game after 3-1.

title: Raptors vs Timberwolves
text: Hey everyone, I am looking for 2 tickets for Raptors game on Wednesday. Anybody know where I can get them?

title: Canada Tennis
text: It was an amazing season for Canadian Milos Raonic, who finished the year world number 3. I hope he can continue his success next year.

title: Better than 73-9?
text: Who thinks Golden State can improve their success and end the season with 74-8?
